title: How to Make Super Easy S'mores

steps.headline: Place graham cracker squares on a work surface.
Use table knife to spread 4 squares with chocolate-hazelnut spread or peanut butter.
Place graham crackers, marshmallow sides down, on top of chocolate-hazelnut spread.
Microwave, uncovered, on 100% power (high) for 30 seconds.
steps.description: (If you want to heat the s'mores one or two at a time, microwave one s'more on 100% power [high] for 10 seconds or two s'mores for 20 seconds. )Serve at once. Makes 4 (four) s'mores.

text: Place graham cracker squares on a work surface.  Use table knife to spread 4 squares with chocolate-hazelnut spread or peanut butter.  Place another graham crackers.  Spread  with marshmallow crème.  Place graham crackers, marshmallow sides down, on top of chocolate-hazelnut spread.  Place on the microwave-safe plate.  Microwave, uncovered, on 100% power (high) for 30 seconds. (If you want to heat the s'mores one or two at a time, microwave one s'more on 100% power [high] for 10 seconds or two s'mores for 20 seconds. )Serve at once. Makes 4 (four) s'mores. Serve and enjoy.  Finished.
